---
title: Pull Day
---

**GOAL:** Moderate (8-12 reps) to low (15-20 reps) weight. Reach failure, then **grind** (essentially slow down) while **maintaining form.**

::: panel-tabset
## Back

| Machine          | Cable                                       | DB           |
|------------------|---------------------------------------------|--------------|
| Row              | Upright row                                 | Row          |
| **Lat pulldown** | Row                                         | Shrugs       |
| Reverse fly      | **Alternating high row (pull angled down)** | Reverse fly  |
|                  |                                             | **Deadlift** |

\+ **wide grip** **pull-ups**

## Bi

| Machine | Cable | DB                                 |
|---------|-------|------------------------------------|
| Curl    | Curl  | Wide curl                          |
|         |       | Preacher curl                      |
|         |       | **Hammer curl** (optional incline) |
:::

**NOTE:** *It's OK to use momentum on final reps to push yourself.*
